recommendations: Ran Ⓥ Green
Founding Partner at Metta Ventures
November 7, 2015, Chi worked with Ran in the same group

Chi is a natural team-builder and recruiter. In all my years of being an executive recruiter, I've yet to seen somebody catch on as fast as Chi. His ability to accurately read people's true motivations and inclinations makes him a wonderful business partner. He's tenacious, persistent, and innately intelligent. I trust him completely as an advisor and business partner.

Chi and I worked together some time ago at Gigwalk, launching and scaling the initial versions from a converted garage in Mtn View. The team was quite small, and Chi played a key role in developing and maintaining relationships with both clients and ‘Gigwalkers’. I recall his curiosity, openness, and integrity, and believe those traits will serve him in any endeavor he wishes to pursue.

Louis Potok
Experienced consultant with expertise using data science and behavioral economics to design and build software products.
October 18, 2016, Chi worked with Louis in different groups

I attended a DataDive where Louis was one of the mentors and organizers. Louis's understanding of all things technical is incredible. He has the ability to effortlessly mentor and teach people who come to him with questions and problems. It's amazing to watch him switch from one topic to another without the slightest bit of hesitation. Without doubt, Louis is somebody you want on your team -- intelligent, always learning, and an excellent teacher. If you have an opportunity to work with him, you're a lucky one!

Greg Mann
Experienced Sales and Growth Leader/ Visionary Entrepreneur and Investor
October 2, 2016, Greg worked with Chi in the same group

I met Greg at Startup Grind LA in 2016 and was immediately captivated by his passion and high energy. I consider him a dear friend and colleague. Greg is the ultimate sales professional. He knows how to set goals and achieve them. He helps entire organizations re-focus on improving their financial bottom lines while engaging employees and improving culture.He has a deep desire to help others on their journeys. He goes above and beyond to be of service to those he feels are doing good in the world. Get Greg on your team if you can. He's an all-star.
